blogs.title: This is a training project in reactjs
blogs.short: I am studying Front End Development at Medieinstitutet 2020-2022, and this is a personal learning project in React.
blogs.body: My aim is to learn as much as possible about ReactJS by building a blog page with different functions. Go to About page to read more about the project.
blogs.author: Susanne Eneroth
